ygData.authorName: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4
ygData.from: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Eldrig the Old
ygData.msgSnippet: Were you in a pickup group when the Harmonic Dagger dropped?  I know there are a lot of greedy players out there, but if I was in a group that made me roll for
ygData.messageBody:
Were you in a pickup group when the Harmonic Dagger dropped? I know there
are a lot of greedy players out there, but if I was in a group that made me
roll for the Harmonic Dagger or any Bard only item, I would quit the group
in disgust and never group with any of them again.

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 9:58 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Eldrig the Old


LOL, actually the group decided to give it to me with no lotto. As the
battle in dropped in was pretty hairy. We had a bit of auto-pull, combined
with the hand room spawning on us. I was doing constant CC for nearly
30mins of non-stop fighting, keeping anywhere from 1 to 4 mobs mezzed at a
time. So they felt I had earned it =)

Rokenn
